tickets.title: Titel

resolve.title: Resolve Ticket

resolve.tipText: Explain how the problem was solved for future reference. Include specific steps, applied solutions, and any relevant information.
resolve.successDescription: The ticket has been marked as resolved.
resolve.errorDefault: Error resolving ticket. Please try again.

close.title: Close Ticket
close.infoDesc: Please confirm that you want to close this ticket. This action cannot be undone.

errors.title: Error Closing Ticket
errors.generic: An error occurred while closing the ticket. Please try again.
errors.notResolved: Only resolved tickets can be closed. Current status: {{status}}
errors.emptyResolution: Resolution notes must be filled before closing the ticket.
errors.noResolvedDate: Resolution date must be set before closing the ticket.

success.title: Ticket Closed
success.description: The ticket has been closed successfully.

reopen.title: Request Reopen
reopen.infoDesc: Your request will be reviewed by an agent. If approved, the ticket will be reopened and you can continue the conversation.
reopen.closedOnly: Only closed tickets can be reopened.
reopen.creatorOnly: Only the ticket creator can request reopen.
reopen.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why this ticket needs to be reopened...
reopen.reasonHelper: Be specific so the agent can evaluate quickly.
reopen.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for reopening.
reopen.noPermission: You do not have permission to request reopening of this ticket.
reopen.sentDesc: Your reopen request has been sent to the agents.

transfer.title: Transfer Ticket
transfer.descriptionSr: Select an agent and provide a reason to transfer the ticket.
transfer.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for the transfer.
transfer.transferError: Error transferring ticket. Please try again.
transfer.workloadHint: Agents are ordered by lower workload first. Consider transferring to agents with fewer assigned tickets.
